title: Investigate Security Camera Footage
description: A guest reports that their car was scratched in the hotel parking lot. Security needs to review camera footage.

tasks.description: Identify the time frame and location where the guest's car was parked.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent determines the car was in Lot B between 2 PM and 5 PM.

tasks.description: Access the security camera system and retrieve the footage from the camera covering that area for the specified time.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent successfully pulls the relevant video footage.

tasks.description: Review the footage to see if the incident was captured.
tasks.expected_outcome: The footage is reviewed, but unfortunately, the incident was not clearly visible. The agent logs the finding.
